content:
TIL about https://mergiraf.org :giraffe: and https://difftastic.wilfred.me.uk :military_medal: and I will give them a whirl!

I'm already using :magic_wand: https://github.com/so-fancy/diff-so-fancy to make the diffs better readable, but I am really curious about these others, as they are not (purely) line based!

With regards to Gitmoji: I'm a long time user and fanboy of https://www.conventionalcommits.org. Trying to do it everywhere! Gitmoji is somewhat similar, but instead of text they use an emoji to transport the message gist's gist.
